timeline.bodyText: Small niggle, you have consistently used the term Thrown when but used Used when here. Won't block approval ofcourse, but might be worth having consistent comments.
timeline.author: samuel-hawker
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -6,6 +6,10 @@
 
 import io.fabric8.kubernetes.api.model.HasMetadata;
 
+/**
+ * Used when an invalid topic is detected

timeline.message:
Use more specific exceptions

Signed-off-by: Tom Bentley <tbentley@redhat.com>
